text: @HillaryClinton @WHO The WHO shirked their responsibility for political purposes out of the leaderships indebtedness to the communist Chinese government. This allowed thousands of travelers to transport the COVID-19 virus worldwide.  Had they done their job 1,000’s would be alive.
